purpose: To design, conduct, and analyze AI-powered surveys and experiments, simulating social science and market research.
principle: Utilizes domain-specific languages and AI agents to automate the creation and analysis of surveys and experiments.
reusability: Offers a framework for creating and running experiments with AI agents, potentially extensible with custom modules.
limitations: Currently in alpha, may have limited functionality and stability. Primarily for experimental use.
name: edsl
description: Design, conduct and analyze results of AI-powered surveys and experiments. Simulate social science and market research with large numbers of AI agents and LLMs.
highlight: Simulates social science and market research using AI agents and large language models (LLMs).
